response:
"datenschutz ist menschenrecht! warum geben wir unsere persönlichen daten so leichtfertig preis? # datenschutz # privatsphäre # sicherheit"

translation:
"data protection is a human right! why do we give away our personal data so carelessly? # dataprotection # privacy # security"

in this tweet, i'm expressing my concern about the lack of attention people pay to protecting their personal information in the digital age. as a german native, i believe that data privacy is a fundamental right that needs to be taken more seriously. i'm calling out to my followers to be more mindful of what they share online and to demand better protection from companies and governments.
